shortdesc.ph: Gets the storage path of cached files.
Gets the storage path of the cache file.
Gets the storage path of the cached files.
Gets the storage path of cached files.

p.codeblock: public abstract int GetCacheDir(out string path, int length);

section.p: If you do not call the method to customize the cache file storage path before calling this method, it returns the SDK's default cache file storage path.
If you have not called the method to customize the storage path of the cache file before calling this method, it returns the SDK's default cache file storage path.
If you have not called the method to customize the cache file storage path before calling this method, the method returns the SDK's default cache file storage path.
If you have not called to customize the cache file storage path before calling this method, it returns the default cache file storage path used by the SDK.

plentry.pd: Input parameter. The maximum length of the cache file storage path string.
Input parameter. The maximum length of the cache file storage path string.
Input parameter. The maximum length of the cache file storage path string.
Output parameter. Storage path of cached files.
Input parameter. Maximum length of the cache file storage path string. Fill in based on the string obtained in path.

ul.li: On success, returns the storage path of the cached file.
The storage path of the cache file, if the method call succeeds.
On success, returns the storage path of the cached files.
